Tips: always check the rating of the product & sellers overall rating, also make sure the sellers your buying from have been around for years, New traders are unproven. I see alot of complaints coming from people that don't look for sellers rating.

ReviewText: I order stuff every month. I find that many items are exactly the same as Amazon, only at a fraction of the price.
